Plugins - Reminders

Plugins in this category remind the user of usage that my be unintuitive.

class symcalc.plugins.plugins_reminders.ReminderMathConstants

Calculator plugin to remind that E is capitalized and pi is not

Initializes the plugin

Parameters

  • name (str) – The name of the plugin

  • priority (int) – The priority of the plugin. Lower numbers designate that a plugin should be run before others

class symcalc.plugins.plugins_reminders.ReminderTwoLetterSymbol

Calculator plugin to remind that symbols are not multiplied together automatically

Initializes the plugin

Parameters

  • name (str) – The name of the plugin

  • priority (int) – The priority of the plugin. Lower numbers designate that a plugin should be run before others
